data.name: The Nightmare Journey Demo
data.detailed_description:
In a peculiar and macabre universe, little Arthur faces his greatest fears, the nightfall and what scares him most, in this brief period of darkness his syndrome transcends the limits of the psychic, the monsters are always on the lookout, will he this time will escape?

Ancients have long marked the stones with an ancient ancestral legend, "Every night the wandering souls of darkness disturb the sleep of energetic beings, a pure-blooded creature is chosen and the boundaries of reality are broken."

All Indications Arthur was chosen this time, and his journey through the nightmare is not going to be easy, dark creatures in a parallel universe want to consume his soul.

The NightMare Journey is a stylized game with unique graphics set in a 2D universe, in which Arthur is the main character, challenges and puzzles were not lacking in this game, to complete each new stage of history it will be necessary to use a lot of your skills in strategy, several enemies Different ones offer a very wide range of gameplay.

The story takes place in a twisted and macabre universe, in which Arthur will have to collect resources and solve puzzles to escape his problems...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i5-2430M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 2.5 GHz / AMD CPU 3,5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / ATI GPU Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requer um processador e sistema operacional de 64 bits
